ginput

Using ginput:

  • Ginput command line interface
  • Downloading met files
  • Making model files
  • Making VMR files
  • Making .map and .map.nc files
  • Updating NOAA input data

ginput code overview:

  • Satellite priors interface

ginput API documentation:

  • tccon_priors module
  • mlo_smo_prep module
  • acos_interface module
